org.openimaj.hadoop.sequencefile

Class SequenceFileUtility<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.hadoop.sequencefile.SequenceFileUtility<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key type
    V - Value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Map.Entry<K,V>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextBytesSequenceFileUtility

    public abstract class SequenceFileUtility<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements Iterable<Map.Entry<K,V>>
    Base class for a utility class that deals with specifically typed sequence files.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SequenceFileUtility.FilenameKeyProvider
      A class that provides Text keys from the name of a file
      static interface  SequenceFileUtility.KeyProvider<K>
      Interface for objects that can make a key from a path
      static class  SequenceFileUtility.MD5UUIDKeyProvider
      A class that provides Text keys by calculating a UUID from the MD5 of a file
      static class  SequenceFileUtility.RelativePathFilenameKeyProvider
      A class that provides Text keys from the relative path + name of a file

        public static URI[] getReducerFiles(String uriOrPath)
                             throws IOException
        Get a list of all the reducer outputs in a directory. If the given path/uri is not a directory, then it is assumed that it is a SequenceFile and returned directly.
        Parameters:
        uriOrPath - the path or uri
        Returns:
        the reducer outputs
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getFiles

        public static URI[] getFiles(String uriOrPath,
             String filenamePrefix)
                      throws IOException
        Get a list of all the sequence files (with a given name prefix) in a directory. If the given uri is not a directory, then it is assumed that it is a SequenceFile and returned directly.
        Parameters:
        uriOrPath - the path or uri
        filenamePrefix - the prefix of the file name
        Returns:
        the matching files
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getFilePaths

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path[] getFilePaths(String[] uriOrPaths,
                                       String filenamePrefix)
                                                throws IOException
        Get a list of all the sequence files (with a given name prefix) in the set of input paths. If a given uri is not a directory, then it is assumed that it is a SequenceFile and returned directly.
        Parameters:
        uriOrPaths - the paths or uris
        filenamePrefix - the prefix of the file name
        Returns:
        the list of sequence files
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getFilePaths

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path[] getFilePaths(String[] uriOrPaths,
                                       String subdir,
                                       String filenamePrefix)
                                                throws IOException
        Get a list of all the sequence files (with a given name prefix) in the set of input paths.

        Optionally a subdirectory can be provided; if provided the subdirectory is appended to each path (i.e. PATH/subdirectory).

        If the given uri is not a directory, then it is assumed that it is a single SequenceFile and returned directly.

        Parameters:
        uriOrPaths - the URI or path to the directory/file
        subdir - the optional subdirectory (may be null)
        filenamePrefix - the prefix of the file name
        Returns:
        the list of sequence files
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getFilePaths

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path[] getFilePaths(String uriOrPath,
                                       String filenamePrefix)
                                                throws IOException
        Get a list of all the sequence files (with a given name prefix) in a directory. If the given uri is not a directory, then it is assumed that it is a SequenceFile and returned directly.
        Parameters:
        uriOrPath - the path or uri
        filenamePrefix - the prefix of the file name
        Returns:
        the list of sequence files
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getFilesRegex

        public static URI[] getFilesRegex(String uriOrPath,
                  String regex)
                           throws IOException
        Get a list of all the sequence files whose names match the given regular expression in a directory. If the given uri is not a directory, then it is assumed that it is a SequenceFile and returned directly.
        Parameters:
        uriOrPath - the path or uri
        regex - the regular expression to match
        Returns:
        a list of files
        Throws:
        IOException

      • exportData

        public void exportData(String uriOrPath,
              NamingStrategy naming,
              ExtractionState extrState,
              boolean addExtension,
              long offset)
                throws IOException
        Extracts file to a directory. Read mode only.
        Parameters:
        uriOrPath - path or uri to extract to.
        naming - the naming strategy
        extrState - the extraction state
        addExtension - if true, then file extensions are added to each record automatically
        offset - offset from which to start. Can be used to reduce number of files extracted.
        Throws:
        IOException

        extrState - the extraction state

      • appendFiles

        public Map<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path,K> appendFiles(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                           org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                                           boolean recurse,
                                           org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathFilter pathFilter,
                                           SequenceFileUtility.KeyProvider<K> keyProvider)
                                                                                   throws IOException
        Append files to a sequenceFile.
        Parameters:
        fs - The filesystem of the files being added.
        path - The path of the file(s) being added.
        recurse - If true, then subdirectories are also searched
        pathFilter - Filter for omitting files. Can be null.
        keyProvider - Object that can return a key for a given file.
        Returns:
        Paths and their respective keys for files that were added.
        Throws:
        IOException

        Parameters:

        offset - the offset from which to commence search
        Returns:
        the found value, or null.

      • find

        public V find(K queryKey)
        Search for the record identified by queryKey. Uses a linear search from the beginning of the file.
        Parameters:
        queryKey -
        Returns:
        the found value, or null.
